Literature.Title: Antifungal peptides: a potential new class of antifungals for treating vulvovaginal candidiasis caused by fluconazole-resistant Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Ng SM, Yap YY, Cheong JW, Ng FM, Lau QY, Barkham T, Teo JW, Hill J, Chia CS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(80-90% Killing=100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(70-80% Killing=100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 64550 (MIC=>100µM)
